attributes.action: award service/campaign medals to ww2 air crews
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I just cant believe todays news that the United Kingdom Government are to award all the girls,ladies who were our land army workers of the second world war an award without doing the same for all the young men whom they replaced and  were conscripted or volunteered from the u.k and commonweath who survived or were killed(80%)delivering a blow to germany day after day/night after night and have been deliberately snubbed for 63 years with no recognition of their ultimate sacrifices and heroic efforts.They have been treated as if they were war criminials, would all surviving air crew,general public, and relatives of those killed in action please join my petition, Vinnie
